name: Juno College of Technology
headline: Juno is the university of the future.

founders.name: Heather Payne, Founder
founders.description: Founder & CEO of Juno College of Technology, my favourite company and community in the whole world. Mom of two. Angel investor. Board member at PARC Toronto and Sheertex.

# Your coding career starts here.
Become a web developer with Canada's longest-running, award-winning Coding Bootcamp — available live online.
[Apply Now](http://junocollege.com/</apply/>)[Student Outcomes Report](http://junocollege.com/<https:/go.junocollege.com/student-outcomes-2022>)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg height='301' width='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![](http://junocollege.com)![](https://images.ctfassets.net/tfvkuuj8nae0/5M3BUhjccjVp9yTnY9cfH3/16a9a83b2e90b64863f1cc27cf552369/juno-college-laptop-excitement.jpg?w=600&h=301&fl=progressive&q=90&fm=jpg)
## It's Still A Great Time To Get Into Tech
With Juno’s deep employer partnerships and ongoing support, you’ll get hired after graduation, fast.
  * 100% Graduation Rate
  * 90% Graduate Employment Rate in Field of Study
  * $62,400 Graduate Median Annual Base Salary


Curious about what sets us apart from other Bootcamps? Here's our secret recipe:
[Juno's Secret Recipe](http://junocollege.com/</why-choose-juno-college-bootcamp/>)

## Say Hello To Your Own Dedicated Career Coach
Our Career Services start on week one of Bootcamp, and won’t end until you’re hired. This includes:
  * Weekly career workshops
  * Weekly one-on-one coaching sessions
  * Personalized resume/cover letter feedback
  * Interview prep training
  * And much more!

## 3 Ways To Fund Your Education
Tech should be accessible for everyone. That's why our scholarships and financing options put you first.
  * ### Recession Relief Scholarship
Kickstart your coding journey with up to $5,000 towards our Web Development Bootcamp. [Learn More](http://junocollege.com/</blog/recession-relief-coding-bootcamp-scholarship/>)
  * ### Income Share Agreements
Pay less upfront for your Bootcamp education, and only pay us back once you’re making at least $50,000 per year in your new job. [Download ISA Info Package](http://junocollege.com/</isa/#info-package>)
  * ### Financeit Loans
Get loans of up to $10,000 with Juno's Financeit partnership. [Download Financeit Info Package](http://junocollege.com/<https:/go.junocollege.com/financeit>)

[Explore Financing Options](http://junocollege.com/</scholarship/>)
## Instructed by Caring Industry Experts
Our diverse team makes sure no one’s left behind. You’ll have a transformational learning experience — and lots of fun!
  * 92%is the average customer satisfaction score of our part-time courses in 2022
  * 94%is the average customer satisfaction score of our Bootcamps in 2022

## Be Yourself in our Inclusive Community
Whether online or in Toronto, you're more than just a seat in Juno's classrooms — you're part of a community where you can be heard, be seen, and be yourself.
  * 89% of Juno's students/alumni would recommend Juno to those from marginalized groups
  * 61% of Juno's students/alumni identify as women
  * 26% of Juno’s students/alumni and staff/faculty identify as Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Queer, Questioning, Pansexual, and others

## 3 Ways To Fund Your Education
Tech should be accessible for everyone. That's why our scholarships and financing options put you first.
  * ### Recession Relief Scholarship
Kickstart your coding journey with up to $5,000 towards our Web Development Bootcamp. Learn More⟨57⟩
  * ### Income Share Agreements
Pay less upfront for your Bootcamp education, and only pay us back once you’re making at least $50,000 per year in your new job. Download ISA Info Package⟨58⟩
  * ### Financeit Loans
Get loans of up to $10,000 with Juno's Financeit partnership. Download Financeit Info Package⟨59⟩

### Juno College of Technology: Your Path to a Brighter Tech Future

**Mission**: Juno College of Technology positions itself as the "university of the future," redefining how tech education is delivered and experienced.

**Background**: Founded in 2012 and based in Toronto, Canada, Juno College began its journey under the name HackerYou. It became part of Y Combinator's Batch S19, gaining invaluable mentorship and connections within the tech ecosystem. The college currently employs around 30 passionate staff members dedicated to fostering a supportive learning environment.

**Website**: To explore more, visit [junocollege.com](http://junocollege.com).

**Educational Offerings**: Juno provides a range of courses aimed at equipping individuals with in-demand tech skills to advance or shift their careers. Their core training includes:
- **Web Development**
- **JavaScript**
- **Data Analytics**
- **UX Design**

They offer both live online and part-time learning options, which means you can customize your learning experience based on your schedule. Their bootcamps, especially in web development, are noted for their rigorous curriculum and high student satisfaction rates.

**Career Support and Outcomes**: One of Juno’s standout features is its robust Career Services program. From day one, every bootcamp participant receives:
- Dedicated career coaching
- Resume and cover letter assistance
- Regular workshops and interview prep
The results speak for themselves: Juno boasts a 100% graduation rate and a 90% employment rate for graduates in their field of study, with a median salary of $62,400.

**Community Focus**: Juno prides itself on fostering an inclusive environment where everyone can thrive. With a substantial proportion of its students identifying as women and LGBTQ+, the college actively promotes diversity and inclusion within its community.

**Funding and Scholarships**: Education shouldn't be a luxury. To that end, Juno offers several financial assistance options, including:
- **Recession Relief Scholarships** (up to $5,000)
- **Income Share Agreements** (pay based on your future salary)
- **Affordable loan options** through their partner Financeit

**Conclusion**: Juno College is more than just a coding bootcamp; it's a transformative experience that combines technical skills with personal development in a supportive community. If you're looking to make a significant career shift or enhance your current skill set, Juno could be the catalyst you need.

So, why wait? Your future in tech might just start with a simple click on [Apply Now](http://junocollege.com/</apply/>).
